about.aboutMe: I'm a photographer based in beautiful Victoria, BC. I love capturing the true personality and spirit of people I photograph. With a fun, relaxed and engaging approach, I capture the uniqueness, beauty and confidence of the person you are. From the cuteness of a new born, to the joys of many life milestones, to casting your talents, and everything in between, I will capture the moments you will cherish forever.
about.contact: Please reach out to me on Instagram (@csondagar) or by email (chetan@sondagar.com)!
